title: Tolkien in Oxford (1968)
description:
This is the famed \"Tolkien in Oxford\" BBC interview/documentary from 1968, one of the very few interview\'s that Tolkien ever did and rarer still that it was a video interview.

It was ripped from the BBC site <a href=" http://www.bbc.co.uk/archive/writers/12237.shtml" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://www.bbc.co.uk/archive/writers/12237.shtml</a>  using StreamTransport into a .flv format (playable in VLC and other standard media players).

More info on this fascinating documentary can be found here: <a href=" http://tolkiengateway.net/wiki/Tolkien_in_Oxford" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://tolkiengateway.net/wiki/Tolkien_in_Oxford</a> 

Enjoy and PLEASE SEED!!!
